name: Taxi Driver 3D City
description:
Are you ready newest of this year taxi simulation? Taxxy : Taxi Driver so fun and so crazy.

Do you like to transport people? The best taxi simulation game of 2016, we have prepared for you, Taxxy : Taxi Driver absolutely must try.

The city is full of amazing fun graphics, real life goes on, cute characters, realistic movements, street singers, you'll live in a city full of air with the police, doctors and even the emerging hooligan fans on match days. The people in the taxi they need to arrive far locations. Passengers should reach the designated time you have each destination.

They will also enjoy a full autumn weather with rain mode, and you will enjoy the driving taxi passenger transport.

Features
* Fun and cute maps
* Cartoon themes
* Easy and flexible car driving
* You will be addicted to the sound and music
* Weather condition is also a very
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
